name: H Y P E R
description:
H Y P E R   is a local multiplayer racing game where you control a spaceship on tracks. 

Get boosts and avoid traps to go faster and faster and faster! 

Up to 4 players on the neon tracks !

---

CONTROLS

Move with Left Joystick

Speed up by pressing A on boost lanes

Avoid Traps and other players to gain speed and win the race !

You need a gamepad for each player

---

a game by @CreaGame (Baptiste Billet) and @Tymus (Dorian Beaugendre) from h i l o q o
developers: h i l o q o
